DOC.brief_summary: The primary hypotheses are that the intervention will improve A1C, blood pressure, lipids, weight, self-efficacy, self-management behaviors, and use of clinical services at 12 and 24 months follow-up.
DOC.brief_title: The Public Private Partnership Addressing Literacy-Numeracy to Improve Diabetes Care
DOC.criteria: Patient has a clinical diagnosis of Type 2 Diabetes Age 1885 years English or Spanish speaking Most recent A1C â‰¥ 7.5% Patient agrees to participate in the study for the full two years duration. Poor visual acuity (vision worse than 20/50 using Rosenbaum Pocket Screener) Significant dementia or psychosis (by health provider report or chart review) Terminal illness with anticipated life expectancy < 2 years (per health provider or patient report).
